home.welcome: Welcome to the Vote Counting System
home.description: A simple and efficient tool to manage the electoral vote counting process. Follow the steps to load voters, configure the counting, register ballots, and obtain results.

features.step1Description: Easily import the voter list from an Excel file
features.step2Description: Define delegates, scrutineers, and process parameters
features.step3Description: Register each ballot quickly and accurately

steps.step1Description: Import the voter list from an Excel file with the required fields
steps.step2Description: Define the number of delegates, scrutineers, and other necessary parameters
steps.step3Description: Register each ballot by selecting the corresponding votes
steps.step4Description: View final results and generate PDF reports

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

step1.title: Step 1: Load Voter List

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid Excel file (.xlsx or .xls)
errors.passwordProtected: This file is password protected and cannot be processed directly.

step1.haveList: There is already a processed list
step1.passwordInstructions: To process this file, you must first unprotect it. Follow these steps:
step1.file-password-step1: Open the Excel file in Microsoft Excel or LibreOffice.
step1.file-password-step4: Remove the password (leave the field blank) and save the file.

step3.title: Step 3: Ballot Registration
step3.nullBallotReasons: Null ballot for one of these reasons:

reasons.less: If the ballot has fewer names
reasons.more: If the ballot has any repeated or extra names

statistics.totalVoters: Total number of voters in list
